name: dfom5

body.origin:

-| diffsc(hs0, com)
-| diffsc(hs0, cint(cab(s0, wlim(cv(s0)))))

comment: ` _om ` is the smallest limit ordinal and can be defined as such (although the Axiom of Infinity is needed to ensure that at least one limit ordinal exists). (Contributed by FL, 22-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Feb-2013.)
